extDescription.message: Release Memory of Tab on regular basis.

setTimerTitle.message: Time to unload of inactive tab

warning_blankPage.message: The linked page and it is not empty and does not have any effect.

warning_extPage.message: If you enable the "Page in the extensions", tabs that are released when the Reload extension updates will be closed. This is the specification of Chrome.
